snippet.title: Summoner's Riff | Everything Goes On | League of Legends Music
snippet.description:
Riot's very own a cappella group, Summoner's Riff, is back bringing holiday cheer this time with an arrangement of Everything Goes On - a song created in collaboration with Porter Robinson celebrating this year's Star Guardian event.

Arranged and performed by Summoner's Riff at the Riot Games LA HQ campus. Summoner's Riff is a group of Rioters based out of our Los Angeles headquarters.

Originally written by: Porter Robinson, Riot Music Team, Fredrik Johansson, and Hige Driver
Arrangement: Keenan Monks & Ford DeCastro

Produced by: Riot Video Team and Summoner's Riff
Performed by: Summoner's Riff
Beatbox Performance by: Keenan Monks
Recorded and Mixed by: Jimmy Sudekum

#porterrobinson  #everythinggoeson  #starguardian  #acappella
